page.title: 06A day in the life of Ian
page.content: I am nine years of age and this is a day in my life. It is Friday morning and I wake up at 7.00 a.m. and read until 7.45 a.m. Then I get dressed, wash my face and clean my teeth. My Mum makes my sandwiches and puts them in my bag. I go to school at 8.40 a.m. and the bell goes at 8.55 a.m. We work until 10.30 a.m., go out to play and come in again at 10.45 a.m. At 12.00 I go to eat my sandwiches and break ends at 1.15 p.m. We go home at 3.15 p.m. At 4.00 p.m. I go to gym club. When I come home I have a cup of tea, then I go to judo. It starts at seven o'clock and finishes at eight. I get home at half past eight. I have something to eat and I go to bed at about 10 o'clock.
